product_name: The North Face Chilkat II Pull-On Snow Boots - Men's
long_description: These waterproof, pull-on, winter boots from The North Face feature durable grippy outsoles and temperature-sensitive outsole lugs for increased traction and insulation for constant warmth.
short_description: These waterproof, pull-on, winter boots from The North Face feature durable grippy outsoles and temperature-sensitive outsole lugs for increased traction and insulation for constant warmth.
